articles.title: U.S. weekly jobless claims fall; spending on equipment strong - Reuters
articles.description: Fewer Americans filed new claims for unemployment benefits last week as the labor market steadily recovers from the COVID-19 pandemic amid a reopening economy, but a dearth of willing workers could hinder faster job growth in the near term.
